data.actual_result: you can see the entire display but in the game's specific resolution.
data.expected_result: you can see what you're sharing in screenshare.
data.short_description: you cant see what's your sharing in any of specific app running. [AMD Specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - start a call with someone - share your screen with someone, choose the specific app that you want to share. make sure that it is not in fullscreen - look at your screen in DM. observe
